reviewText: ordered it, got it in no time...  ordered a similar thing the same time, still haven't gotten it... weird...  thanks folks, good stuff, you're making my holiday!

Wacky, hilarious and never ending entertainment!

Maybe these are old cartoon, but today, my 10 & 12 year sons are glued to the TV with Pinky and the brain (like me, old dad...).

A classic and apart from the bumpersticker title, there are many more themes you can think of. Enjoy!

make these review requests go away. The DVD is fabulous, the follow up annoying. Design the website for crappy slow third world service. Where's the submit button? How can I make this sloooooow web page go away? What a crappy design. You must be the red 'lectroids from the eighth dimension. Make the bells and whistles that chew up bandwidth go away.

If you are a fan of Pinky and the Brain then you need no review to know you must own these DVD's.  All the episodes are there, just as you remember them from the TV show.  And a few of the shorts that I wasn't sure would be there, such as the States Song are there too, attached to episodes.  I haven't watched all 3 DVD's yet, but I am hoping that Cheese from Around the world will show up too.  Great to have in any collection, Pinky and the Brain is going to be a cult classic.  Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
Your never to old for cartoons, well this ones really cool , a modern day classic...

I had turned my Dad on to the show and purchased this set for him as a Christmas present.  I think it was his favorite present, its late January and he hasn't stopped watching it.

This was a great series, along with Animaniacs; with great adult humor undertones. A shame its not on the air anymore

Great collection of all episodes on 3 DVD's. As I am a big fan of the series it was a must-have for me! Because I am Austrian I wanted to have a german DVD-box, but unfortunately there is none - so I decided to buy the english version.

Pinky and the brain: seasons 1, 2, & 3.  They are just as delightfully insane as I had hoped.  The episodes on tv tend to repeat; this combo gets them all.  Great fun and sharp silliness. Some days you cheer for the brain, some days for Pinky.
My whole family really enjoys watching Pinky and the Brain try to take over the world.

A timely collection of classic cartoons designed to suit an adults sense of humour rather than children's in a clean way. Easy to sit down and watch one episode as a means of relaxation at the end of a long day or simply veg out for a whole day with the series.
i'm happy with it

Ahhh childhood.

These discs were in excellent condition, and continue to provide endless hours of enjoyment and flashbacks to plotting world domination as a 7 year old.
grand kids love it
Just as funny and good as I remember, NARF!!!

Totally Happy to have a cartoon / show I used to rush home from work just to see plain and simple very funny I would list certain things I do not like about this collection as well certain episodes but I will keep it short

Animaniacs, which Pinky and the Brain are part of, are some of the best cartoons ever put on TV.  Sadly overlooked, they are brilliant in their humor for both adults and kids.  Pinky and the Brain are two mice who want to take over the world, and the adventures they go through while the Brain tries to implement his plan and Pinky...well, tries to go along, are hilarious!
The DVDs arrived when expected and are terrific! Thank you!
Awesome. Great stuff. Would buy again
GREAT!
EXCELLENT!
awesome show
Was damaged

The last time I can remember there being a great afternoon cartoon lineup, it included this, The New Batman/Superman Adventures, Anamaniacs, and Men in Black.  I had grown up on afternoon cartoons, after this and the others left The WB, afternoon cartoons wemt down the tubes.  Get your hands on this collection, it will bring back great memories.  Are you people pondering what K'm pondering?  If so, then you agree with my rating for this great cartoon.
Funny stuff.  Great quality.  Good to see a "Brain" wanting to take over the world.

great entertainment for both kids and adults much more than just comedy
As far as spin-off goes, this is one of the best (originally characters from ''Animaniacs''). But just to specify, it does not include the continuing adventures in ''Pinky, Elmyra & The Brain''!
Gift receipient loved it

This is a modern day classic cartoon series that provides the best ways to take over the world. I have learned so much from this series I recommend this for schools and churches. The input that pinky has provided is not equaled by any of the last four presidents. Brain could teach congress many new approaches to dealing with our society.

Both myself and my (6 year old) boy love watching this together. I'm a research scientist and work with lab rats so it's specially funny. A must for any 'young at heart' researcher's DVD library collection.

This is an excellent classic cartoon series. You will enjoy watching this and can share this with your family. It is a very family friendly show. The print quality on the DVD is great and you will not be disappointed. This is a rare series and is very hard to find. It is definately work picking up on Amazon if it is still available.

Seems like the primary concern Spielberg had when creating these discs was how to prevent people in other countries from having broadcast-quality episodes to pirate, because P&B volumes 1 - 3 look REALLY inferior even on a 40" television screens. The scan lines are clearly visible, the colors are washed out and dull, and even my Sony upscaling DVD player can't do much with these discs because the source material was so overcompressed in order to fit this many episodes on these few discs. The quality episodes you watched on TV are NOT the low-quality episodes you'll be frustrated at watching in this series. Frankly, I'd wait for the Blu-Ray version of this series...
Nice collection got it for Christmas. My favorite adult cartoons! Got it as gift from my husband and even my daughter enjoys.

This is a late post.  I LOVE this show!!!!  I had the dvd's rush-delivered and they arrived on time.  I was thrilled when I got them and I did nothing except watch my two favorite future rulers of the world for the rest of the day!

First Brain reminded me of Napoleon, yet these animated characters were set in the late 1990's, along with the political events occurring at the time, making fun of their activities.  So Funny. I recommend "Pinky and the Brain for adults too. For a good laugh.
My wife can't stand it.... but I love it.  So many awesome memories, I love watching these!  And it's nice to have it in one neat collection

My husband and I watch this series together! It brings back wonderful childhood memories of cartoon watching fun! We love it and are happy to have this series as part of our movie library! Thanks so much!

Pinky and the Brain is a great show.
I really really hope they keep putting out all the old classics.

Pinky and the brain is all laughs and smiles. Having a bad day? Pop in this and you just might turn your day around. Two mice trying to prove their mousy worth and take over the world? Who wouldn't love this?

I bought the entire series of Pinky and the Brain in December 2012. I found it very hard to track down where I live here in Australia. The price was very good. The product was in sealed good condition, apart from a slit, what appeared to be a knife mark on the case of the first season, however it did affect the disc. The service/communication from the seller was very good and clear. They immediately sent me reply and confirmation of purchase. Delivery was very quick and well before the estimated delivery time. I highly recommend this seller to everyone interested. Many Thanks.
VERY HAPPY. ENJOYED THE MOVIES PLEASANT EXPERIANCE WOULD USE AGAIN. DEFINLY WORTH THE FIVE STAR RATEING, ARRIVED IN TIMELT MANNER
my oldest son loves pink and the Brain series,he just loved it.someday he wants to make his own cartoon's and movies.
How do you write about this pair. You love this type of comic which I do or you don't ,you're loss.

We used to watch Pinky and the Brain and enjoyed it.  It was very creative and had some very clever lines.  Over the years my husband said he would like to see some of the episodes again, so now we can watch the whole thing again.  It's fun.
This is not just kids stuff,funny for all ages to watch again and again,you can have The Simpsons and Family Guy and all that stuff,this is pure GENIUS.
Loved this show when it was on the air and missed it dearly once it ended! Now I have nothing to worry about!

This was my boyfriend's favourite TV show when he was a kid, and I thought I'd surprise him with this as his birthday gift. Best. Gift. Ever. He LOVED IT! We started watching it immediately, and I was hooked! It's such an amazing show, and I cant believe that I grew up and never seen this show before!

Got this for my brother who insisted on getting all the volumes of pinky and the brain! The price from this seller was unbeatable. I normally try to get Amazon prime eligible items so i can get them quickly, but the same product that was amazon prime eligible was $20 more. Plus it was for my brother n he didn't want to spend that much. When I got the confirmation email it told me that I wasn't getting this item till April 5, 2012. I got it today March 20, 2012. Took only six days on standard shipping. I honestly was not expecting this package till later! 16 days later to be exact! Happy with the service and the product. My brother is currently watching/testing the product as i write this.
Bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. We both so love watching Pinky and the Brain trying to take over the world night after night! Narf!
I was quite pleased with this product. Occassionally it is a little jumpy in spots but this does not affect the viewability of the dvds
great item
My son (25) and I love watching these. Brings us back to when he was a toddler and still makes us laugh!
Great underrated series.  Very clever.
Better than expected

Seriously, thanks a ton for making this a bundle, so I can share this show onto my brother's kids with joy.
Really great show!
